description: Customer reports a persistent rattling noise from the dashboard area at speeds above 50 mph. Brought in twice but issue was not resolved. Requesting a third inspection with a senior technician.
resolution: Escalated to senior tech. Appointment scheduled for Jan 22.

description: Customer was promised a spray-in bedliner as part of the deal but it was not installed before delivery. Has been waiting two weeks for a callback from the sales team.
resolution: Sales manager contacted customer. Bedliner installation scheduled for Jan 18.

description: Customer states the final APR on the loan (5.9%) is higher than the rate quoted during negotiation (4.5%). Requesting a review and possible rate adjustment.
resolution: Finance team reviewing original deal paperwork. Escalated to finance director.

description: Infotainment system freezes intermittently and requires a full restart. Has happened 4 times in the first month of ownership. Customer requesting a replacement unit under warranty.
resolution: Warranty claim submitted to Hyundai. Awaiting parts availability.

description: Customer found a small rust spot on the undercarriage that should have been caught during the CPO inspection. Questioning the thoroughness of the inspection process.
resolution: Rust spot treated and undercoated at no charge. Additional inspection performed. Customer satisfied with resolution.

description: Vehicle was delivered with 340 miles on the odometer instead of the advertised 10 miles. Customer concerned the car may have been used as a demo or loaner without disclosure.
resolution: Investigating mileage discrepancy with inventory team. May offer mileage adjustment credit.

description: Customer feels the trade-in value offered ($18,000) was $3,000 below KBB fair market value. Wants a re-evaluation or price match to KBB estimate.
resolution: Re-appraised vehicle and adjusted trade-in to $19,500. Customer accepted revised offer.

description: The online inventory shows vehicles as available that are already sold or reserved. Customer drove 45 minutes to the dealership only to find the car was not available.
resolution: IT team notified to audit inventory sync between website and dealer management system.
